contentrichtext.text: __NOINDEX__ {{WikiProject status|defunct}} == Title == '''WikiProject Theme Songs''' == Mission == This [[WikiPedia:WikiProject|WikiProject]] aims to unify the description of theme songs for a whole array of [[Film|movie]]s, [[Television program|television series]] and other animation pieces. Optimally, it should conform to the [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style|Manual of Style]] and potentially be added thereto. It should be simple enough that it can support [[United States|American]], [[United Kingdom|British]], [[Japan]]ese, et al. movies and television shows. == Participants == *[[User:Emperorbma|Emperorbma]] *[[User:TcDohl|TcDohl]] *[[User:Wootking|Wootking]] *[[User:E_Wing|E_Wing]] *[[user:ayame's son|ayame's son]] *[[User:Phenie|Phenie]] == Template == Create a section labeled "Theme songs" or some similar phrase and create the following sections as needed. ''Refers to Opening themes'' *OP *# "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer <u>(Sn: Eps a-m)</u> *# "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer <u>(Sn: Eps n-z)</u> ''Refers to Ending themes'' *ED *# "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer ''Refers to [[OVA|Original Video Animation]] ([[anime]] only)'' *OVA "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') ** OP: "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer ** ED: "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer ''Refers to Movie theme songs (Opening and Ending are subsections)'' *Movies *# "''Italic Romanized Official movie name (sans Series name†)''"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') *#* OP: "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer *#* ED: "Romanized Official"; <u>Special charset</u> (''Italic Translation'') by Singer '''Footnotes'''<br> * Optional Abbreviations: ** OP = Opening song ** ED = Ending song * Sub-sections are optional based on whether or not they are used. * A "translation" is only necessary for foreign songs, or songs that have an alternate name. **E.g. <nowiki>"Every Heart" (''Minna no Kimochi'')</nowiki> **E.g. <nowiki>"Sobakasu" (''Freckles'')</nowiki> *Optional: Provide foreign characterset spelling to the right of the romanized spelling. (e.g. [[Kanji]]) * <u>underline</u> - Data is optional * (Sn: eps a-z) - Provide episodes used in. Optional [[iff]] the song remains the same for the whole series. ** Sn (Season Number) is optional if there are no seasons in the series, or it is measured by absolute episode number. *** S = 'S' *** n = Season # * (#) - Theme song number optional [[iff]] series only has one song in that category. (e.g. Only one Opening song) * â€  - ''Inuyasha: Toki wo Koeru Omoi'' is denoted as ''Toki wo Koeru Omoi''.
